mapper.select: select row_number() over (order by a.create_date) RNUM, a.task_id, a.task_name, b.department, a.task_type, a.issue, c.name, a.status, a.start_date, a.end_date, a.create_date, a.description, a.comment1 from tb_iersf00 a , (select task_type, listagg(department,', ') within group (order by department) as department from TB_IERS_TASK_TYPES group by task_type) b, (select aa.task_type, listagg(aa.name,', ') within group (order by aa.name) as name from(select a.task_type, b.name from tb_iers_types_assignee a , tb_iers_users b where a.code = b.code group by a.code, b.name,a.task_type) aa group by aa.task_type) c where a.task_type = b.task_type and a.task_type = c.task_type
select count(*) as total_count from tb_iersf00
select department from tb_iers_task_types where task_type = #{task_type}

select row_number() over (order by a.create_date) RNUM, a.task_id, a.task_name, b.department, a.task_type, a.issue, c.name, a.status, a.start_date, a.end_date, a.create_date, a.description, a.comment1 from tb_iersf00 a , (select task_type, listagg(department,', ') within group (order by department) as department from TB_IERS_TASK_TYPES group by task_type) b, (select aa.task_type, listagg(aa.name,', ') within group (order by aa.name) as name from(select a.task_type, b.name from tb_iers_types_assignee a , tb_iers_users b where a.code = b.code group by a.code, b.name,a.task_type) aa group by aa.task_type) c where a.task_type = b.task_type and a.task_type = c.task_type and a.task_id=#{task_id} order by create_date
select distinct b.name||'('||b.code||')' as pk, b.code, b.name,b.department from TB_IERS_TYPES_assignee a, TB_IERS_USERS b where a.code = b.code and a.task_type = #{task_type}

select distinct a.name||'('||a.code||')' as pk, a.code, a.name, a.department from tb_iers_users a, (select department from TB_IERS_TASK_TYPES where task_type = #{task_type}) b where a.department = b.department
mapper.update: update tb_iersf00 set status=#{status} where task_id=#{task_id}
